products.name: Rice Krispies
products.description: Delicious corn-based rice grains melted together with marshmallows into a square-like shape.

products.name: Flamin Hot Cheetos
products.description: No one knows what's in the powder that covers these snacks, but wow is it amazing!

products.name: Aeonium
products.description: Aeoniums are brightly colored succulents. While they grow in a variety of sizes and colors, most have thick, waxy leaves that resemble pinwheel rosettes.

products.name: Echeveria
products.description: Echeverias form beautiful rosettes in a wide variety of shapes and colors. They are popular substitutes for wedding bouquets, and succulent arrangements.

products.name: Aloe
products.description: Aloes are most commonly known due to the medicinal properties and popularity of Aloe vera. However, this group of succulents is diverse in size and texture. You'll find colorful hybrids and massive varieties that can live 100 years or more.

products.name: Sushi
products.description: Sushi is a traditional Japanese dish of prepared vinegared rice, usually with some sugar and salt, accompanying a variety of ingredients, such as seafood, often raw, and vegetables.
